name: Golden Age
overview: Golden Age is a game in which you play a caveman. Your goal is to catch eggs dropped by a dragon to feed your family. Avoid the red ones, as they are actually fireballs. You also have to contend with scorpions on the ground by jumping over them when they cross the screen. This game was developed in Italy by Pietro Pino and published in the following: • Commodore 64 Club #08 [Italian Release] • Commodore Computer Club Nr.6 [v1+v2] • Alga Soft 1989 n.4b
